item.title: Roland TD-17KVX Electronic Drum Kit
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Professional performance. Compact design. The Roland TD-17KVX electronic drum kit offers realistic drumming experience with advanced features, perfect for stage or studio use.
item.content:encoded:
Elevate your drumming experience with the Roland TD-17KVX Electronic Drum Kit. Designed for professional performance and practice, this advanced kit features Roland’s renowned Prismatic Sound Modeling technology, which faithfully reproduces the natural dynamics and tonal nuances of acoustic drums. The TD-17 module offers a wide range of high-quality sounds, including 50 preset kits, 310 instruments, and 50 user kits for customizing your sound. The TD-17KVX kit includes a premium VH-10 hi-hat cymbal, CY-12C crash cymbal, and CY-13R ride cymbal, all mounted on sturdy chrome-plated stands for maximum stability and playability. With its realistic feel, expressive sounds, and innovative features such as Bluetooth connectivity and onboard coaching functions, the Roland TD-17KVX is the ultimate electronic drum kit for aspiring and professional drummers alike.

  • Roland TD-50X drum module
  • 100 Drum kits
  • Prismatic sound modelling technology
  • Playback of WAV samples from an SD card
  • USB 10-channel audio output for convenient multitrack recording with only one USB cable
  • 14x Trigger inputs 6.3mm stereo jack inputs
  • 3x Digital Trigger Inputs for Roland Digital Drum Pads with Multi-Sensor Technology
  • 2x XLR (balanced) main outputs
  • 8x 6.3 mm Jack (TRS) direct outs
  • 3.5 mm Stereo jack headphone output
  • 3.5 mm Stereo jack input for connecting an MP3 or CD player
  • MIDI In & Out
  • USB MIDI interface for direct connection from Mac or PC
  • 6.3 mm Stereo jack input for footswitch
  • Metronome with “Quiet Count” function
  • 3-Band EQ and compressor for each individual pad
  • 3 Multi-effect processors with 30 algorithms
  • 2-Band multi-compressor and 4-band EQ for outputs
